title: Jericoin
author: Jericoin
created_time: December 14, 2022, 02:52:41 AMLast edit: February 18, 2024, 01:52:46 PM by Jericoin
content: Jericoin ProjectJericoin is a proof of stake coin, a blockchain with masternode as the second layer. With permanent Masternode collateral and variable reward structure.JeriCoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network.New Release from 0JericoinHosting: https://jericoin.com/hostingMore Info at: https://jericoin.comGithub: https://github.com/JericoinProject/JHLBlockExplorer: https://explorer.jericoin.comTelegram: https://t.me/+lkghONb9wF9iMGE0Coin SpecsAlgorithm : sha256csmTicker : JHLPre-mine : 500,000 --> will be used for liquidity poolsMax. Supply : 100,000,000Masternodes: Enabled from Block# 5001POW Blocks : 1 - 100,000 --> Reward: 95%Miner/5%MasternodePOS Blocks: 100,001 - infinite --> Reward: 90%Masternode/5%StakerBlock time : 45 SecondsMaturity : 100Ports : 31357(p2p) - 31358(rpc)UsecaseHosting Store using JHL as payment methodUse your JHL coins to pay for Hosting services. You can use your assets for use hosting services like domains, VPS-KVM, semi-dedicated and dedicated hosting, we provide you several Data Centers to pickThank you for let us to announce...

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: Quote from: Dr Jafar00 on January 23, 2023, 04:28:20 AMCoins that rug so quicklyHow do you figure?Sure, there was a couple restarts but that was simply to fix bad code (froze when PoS started) and alter reward structure and extend PoW mining from 1k to 30k in order to allow people to earn something to be able to PoS.Rug pulls are defined as coins that you buy into and then the dev goes silent before the chain has a strong enough community to keep it alive. What is your definition?

comments.body: This is odd. How and why did it restart?Is the pre-mine to cover everyone's balance from previous chain?Why treat us like mushrooms? (Keeping everyone in the dark). Not a single word and BAM, chain restart.(Again, I might add).
